tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE course_schedule (
  course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  course_name VARCHAR(255),
  room_id INT,
  faculty_id INT,
  day_of_week ENUM('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday'),
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
);
CREATE TABLE Courses (course_id INT PRIMARY KEY, course_name VARCHAR(255), faculty_id INT);
CREATE TABLE Rooms (room_id INT PRIMARY KEY, room_name VARCHAR(255), capacity INT);
CREATE TABLE Faculty (faculty_id INT PRIMARY KEY, faculty_name VARCHAR(255), department VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE Schedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  course_id INT,
  faculty_id INT,
  room_id INT,
  schedule_time DATETIME,
  FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES Course(course_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (faculty_id) REFERENCES Faculty(faculty_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES Room(room_id)
);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT,
    room_id INT,
    faculty_id INT,
    schedule_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE availability (
    availability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    entity_id INT,
    entity_type TEXT,
    available_from TIMESTAMP,
    available_to TIMESTAMP
);
